casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Carper, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Carper (1999), 87 Ohio St.3d 35.]

(No. 99-927 Submitted September 15, 1999 Decided October 13, 1999.) William N. Eachus and Jeffrey L. Finley, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Weitbrecht (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 368, 715 N.E.2d 167.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents for the reasons stated in his dissenting opinion in State v. Weitbrecht (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 368, 374, 715 N.E.2d 167, 172.
